q_ch: 我们现在有哪些缝纫组，哪些裁剪组？
q_en: What sewing groups and cutting groups do we have now?

steps.sql: SELECT name, type FROM working_group WHERE type IN ('sew', 'cut');
steps.description: Retrieve the names and types of all working groups that are either sewing or cutting groups.

response:
Sure thing! Here's a list of the sewing and cutting groups we currently have:

| Group Name          | Type  |
|---------------------|-------|
| Precision Cutters   | Cut   |
| Master Sewers       | Sew   |
| Master Cutters      | Cut   |
| Expert Cutters      | Cut   |
| Professional Cutters| Cut   |
| Advanced Cutters    | Cut   |
| Skilled Sewers      | Sew   |
| Advanced Sewers     | Sew   |
| Premier Sewers      | Sew   |
| Elite Sewers        | Sew   |

Looks like we have a great mix of talented groups! 🧵✂️ If you have any more questions, feel free to ask! 😄
